channel.title: Bernat Klein on Artangled

item.title: Bernat Klein: His Garden | Rodeo
item.description: The dog days for Londonâ€™s commercial galleries come slightly after the dog days of actual summer. This weekend, I walked around Mayfair as usual, knowing not much would be open - and, sure enough, most of the galleries were in darkness, or with white paper or blinds on the windows, the early autumn exhibition in the process of being installed. Only during Christmastime is there less on offer to the dedicated gallery-goer.
